hero.title: Share wishes,
hero.subtitle: Create wishboxes for any occasion and share them with your loved ones. Free, simple, beautiful.

problem.label: The problem
problem.title: Everyone asks: What do you want?
problem.text: You type the same wishes into five different chats. Aunt Inge asks by text, grandpa calls, and in the end you get the same gift three times.

solution.label: The solution
solution.title: One link for everyone.
solution.text: Create a wishbox, share the link — done. Everyone sees what you wish for and can reserve gifts. No more duplicates.

scraper.label: Automatic
scraper.title: Paste a link — product recognized.
scraper.text: Just paste a link. Title, image and price are loaded automatically. No tedious typing.

share.label: Sharing
share.title: Share & Reserve.
share.text: Share your list via link. Family and friends can reserve wishes — no account needed. Everyone knows what's still available.

themes.label: Occasions
themes.title: The right design for every occasion.
themes.text: Birthday, Christmas, wedding or baby — choose a theme and make your wishbox special.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website.
privacy.responsibleText: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
privacy.name: [TODO: Full name]
privacy.cookiesText: Our website uses technically necessary cookies. These are required for the website to function correctly (e.g., session cookies for authentication). Technically necessary cookies are stored on the basis of Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR.
privacy.accountText: When you create a user account, we store your email address and encrypted password. This data is processed to provide the service (Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR). You can delete your account at any time.
privacy.wishlistText: When you create wishboxes, we store the data you enter (title, description, product links, product data). When wishes are reserved, the name of the person reserving is stored. Shared wishboxes are publicly accessible via a randomly generated link.
privacy.scrapingText: When you add a product URL, our servers fetch the page to extract product data (title, image, price). No personal data is transmitted to the retrieved shops.
privacy.affiliateText: This website contains affiliate links to online shops. If you make a purchase through these links, we receive a commission. The respective shop operators may set cookies and collect data in accordance with their own privacy policies.
privacy.hostingText: This website is hosted by an external service provider (host). The personal data collected on this website is stored on the host's servers. The host will only process your data to the extent necessary to fulfill its service obligations.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing, as well as a right to correction or deletion of this data. You can contact us at any time regarding this and other questions about data protection.
privacy.rightsListEinschraenkung: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
